reviewText: I really enjoyed this film and wouldn't hesitate sending it to friends who don't mindthis kind of humor.It is compared to Best In Show and, although it is a distant second, it is a lot of laughs andfun.

reviewText: I expected to see a movie, the first few minutes looked like a documentary. I had to fast forward to the actual "movie" part. Its basically a mock documentary and behind the scenes. I have to admit it had some funny moments, but unfortunately i was half asleep by the time the funny parts began.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I would warn everyone against this movie save for any aspiring screenwriter looking for that light at the end of the tunnel.  I mean, if this movie can be made, then there is reason to rejoice.  I'm still trying to figure out what i was drinking and how much to make me think this movie was a good idea.
Title: N/A

reviewText: A dysfunctional "family" of adult film stars reunites for a memorial porn shoot following the death of legendary producer, Mo Saltzman. In the tradition of Waiting for Guffman and Spinal Tap, LOVE SHACK is a mockumentary that does for the adult film industry what Best in Show did for dog shows.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I liked it, but it felt slow as I watched it.  I especially enjoyed all the fake porn movie names.  I don't regret it.
